basics.name: Yuxin Shang
basics.summary: Senior in Tsinghua University. Short biography for the left-hand sidebar

skills.Data Modeling: In microlensing, data modeling is rather complicated because of its mathematical structure. I am good at using MCMC/downhill algorithm with grid-search method to finish multi-dimensionally data modeling.
skills.HPC: I am experienced in using HPC to conduct computation-intensive project.
skills.Deep Learning: In my recent study, I try to use a deep learning model to study cosmology. I am now learning how to train and utilize deep learning model for astronomy

publications.name: Binary-lens Microlensing Degeneracy: Impact on Planetary Sensitivity and Mass-ratio Function

presentations.name: Conference Poster Talk on Binary-lens Microlensing Degeneracy
presentations.event: International Conference on Exoplanets and Planet Formation
